com.incadencecorp.coalesce.common.helpers

Class XmlHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.incadencecorp.coalesce.common.helpers.XmlHelper

  • public final class XmlHelper
extends Object
    Provides helper methods for serializing and deserializing objects to XML.
    Author:
    InCadence

      • deserialize

        public static Object deserialize(String xml,
                                 Class<?> classType)
        Create the object instance of the classType that represents the serialized XML string provided using the xml. If there is any problem deserializing the object then null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        xml - the XML string to be deserialized.
        classType - the type of the object to be deserialized.
        Returns:
        the object instance of the provided XML.

      • getAttribute

        public static String getAttribute(Node xmlNode,
                                  String name)
        Returns the attribute with the specified name in the provided node. If the attribute name cannot be found then an empty string is returned.
        Parameters:
        xmlNode - the node containing the attribute.
        name - the name of the attribute.
        Returns:
        the value of the attribute requested.

      • getAttributeAsDate

        public static org.joda.time.DateTime getAttributeAsDate(Node xmlNode,
                                                        String name)
        Returns the attribute with the specified name in the provided node as a DateTime. If the attribute name cannot be found then null is returned.
        Parameters:
        xmlNode - the node containing the attribute.
        name - the name of the attribute.
        Returns:
        the date representation of the attribute requested.

      • setAttribute

        public static void setAttribute(Document doc,
                                Node xmlNode,
                                String name,
                                String value)
        Sets the value of the specified attribute using the provided value. If the attribute does not exist yet then a new attribute is created for the node and the value is set.
        Parameters:
        doc - the parent XML document for the XML node.
        xmlNode - the XML node that contains the attribute to change.
        name - the attribute name.
        value - the value to set the attribute with.

      • setAttribute

        public static void setAttribute(Document doc,
                                Node xmlNode,
                                String name,
                                org.joda.time.DateTime value)
        Sets the value of the specified attribute using the provided DateTime. If the attribute does not exist yet then a new attribute is created for the node and the value is set.
        Parameters:
        doc - the parent XML document for the XML node.
        xmlNode - the XML node that contains the attribute to change.
        name - the attribute name.
        value - the value to set the attribute with.
